argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ringrng | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Rng ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ringrng | |- ( S e. Ring -> S e. Rng ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> ( R e. Rng /\ S e. Rng ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_mhmismgmhm | |- ( F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) -> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) -> ( ( R e. Rng /\ S e. Rng ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` S ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_isrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8 | #P_isrnghmmul | |- ( F e. ( R RngHomo S ) <-> ( ( R e. Rng /\ S e. Rng ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 9, 10 | #P_3imtr4i | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F e. ( R RngHomo S ) ) |
